text:
It would appear that Kupu is not working due to the move to UUIDs. The following
error is dumped when an page is edited:

The source [lenya://lenya/pubs/default/content/authoring//index] does not exist!
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 18854
Potential fix.

This seems to fix the problem. However, I know very little about how this
works, so something else may be affected. With this patch, documents do load
and can be saved. Took the path information from
src/modules/editors/sitemap.xmap for the forms editor.

creator: jonathan.addison@wyona.com
text:
Hi Richard, this is one of the issues already fixed in the patch for bug 39890.
 I will mark this as a duplicate for now.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 39890 ***
